author: Lukas Reiter
script:
"""
This script extracts the values of all in-scope HTTP response headers, which are specified in variable 
session["re_header_names"] (see Lines 9+) and displays them in the table above.
"""
import re

# Do the initial setup
if ref == 1 or "header_names" not in session or "case_sensitive" not in session:
	session["re_header_names"] = [re.compile("^Server$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^X-Powered-By$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Content-Security-Policy$",  re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^X-Frame-Options$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Strict-Transport-Security$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^X-XSS-Protection$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^X-Content-Type-Options$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Access-Control-Allow-Origin$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Access-Control-Allow-Methods$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Access-Control-Allow-Headers$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Access-Control-Expose-Headers$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Access-Control-Allow-Credentials$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Access-Control-Max-Age$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Origin$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Referrer-Policy$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Cache-control$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Pragma$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Expires$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Age$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^X-Cache$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^CF-Cache-Status$", re.IGNORECASE),
		re.compile("^Vary$", re.IGNORECASE)]
	header = ["Ref.", "URL", "Path", "Extension", "Status Code", "Has Params", "Content-Type"]
	extension = url.getPath().split(".")[-1]
	extension = extension if "/" not in extension else ""
	for item in session["re_header_names"]:
		header.append(item.pattern)

# Process only in-scope HTTP responses
response = message_info.getResponse()
if in_scope and response:
	response_info = helpers.analyzeResponse(response)
	content_type = get_content_type(response_info.getHeaders())
	results = get_headers(response_info.getHeaders(), session["re_header_names"])
	parameter_count = len(request_info.getParameters())
	count = 0
	row = []
	for key in session["re_header_names"]:
		value = results[key.pattern]
		value = ";".join(value) if value is not None else ""
		if value:
			count = count +1
			row.append(value)
		else:
			row.append("")
	if count > 0:
		tmp = [ref, get_hostname(url), url.getPath(), extension, response_info.getStatusCode(), parameter_count>0, content_type]
		tmp.extend(row)
		rows.append(tmp)
name: Header - Template Script to Extract HTTP Response Header Values via Regular Expressions
